description.value:
Normal effect

You move your starship up to its speed and can make any turns allowed by its maneuverability. This doesn’t require a skill check.

system.effectNormal: You move your starship up to its speed and can make any turns allowed by its maneuverability. This doesn’t require a skill check.

phase.name: Helm phase
phase.tooltip: This action can be taken only during the helm phase.
